V0 Directory Reference

Files

file  csl_edma3ChannelClose.c
 The file implements the API which is used to close a previously opened EDMA Channel.
 
file  csl_edma3ChannelOpen.c
 The file implements the API which is used to open an EDMA channel.
 
file  csl_edma3Close.c
 The file implements the API which is used to close the EDMA Module.
 
file  csl_edma3GetHwChannelSetup.c
 The file implements API's which are used to retreive setup information specific to an opened EDMA Channel.
 
file  csl_edma3GetHwChannelStatus.c
 The file implements the API which is used to retreive the status of an opened EDMA Channel.
 
file  csl_edma3GetHwSetup.c
 The file implements the API which to get the setup information for all DMA and QDMA channels which are in the EDMA module.
 
file  csl_edma3GetHwStatus.c
 The file implements the API which to get status of various entities in the EDMA module.
 
file  csl_edma3HwChannelControl.c
 The file implements the API which is used to configure the various properties of an opened channel.
 
file  csl_edma3HwChannelSetup.c
 The file implements the API's which are used to setup the properties of the channel.
 
file  csl_edma3HwControl.c
 The file implements the API's which is used to configure the various entities in the EDMA Module.
 
file  csl_edma3HwSetup.c
 The file implements the API's which is used to configure all the DMA/QDMA channels in the EDMA module with the specified configuration.
 
file  csl_edma3Init.c
 The file implements the API to initialize the EDMA Module.
 
file  csl_edma3Open.c
 The file implements the API to open the EDMA Module.
 
file  csl_edma3Param.c
 The file implements the API's which handle the PARAM-SET in the EDMA Module.
